hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select EOIC.EOIC_ID, EOIC.CREATOR, EOIC.CREATE_TIME, EOIC.MODIFIER, EOIC.MODIFY_TIME, EOIC.REC_VER, EOIC.REC_STATUS, EOIC.ORG_ID, EOIC.TIME_ZONE, EOIC.PM_CODE, EOIC.EOIC_EODP_PM_CODE, EOIC.EOIC_NO, EOIC.EOIC_LEFT_BRACKET, EOIC.EOIC_COLUMN_CODE, EOIC.EOIC_OPERATE, EOIC.EOIC_VALUE, EOIC.EOIC_RIGHT_BRACKET, EOIC.EOIC_CONTROL_LOGIC from EO_ISSUED_CONDITION EOIC where 1=1 <<and EOIC.EOIC_ID=:eoipId>> <<and EOIC.CREATOR = :creator>> <<and EOIC.CREATE_TIME = :createTime>> <<and EOIC.MODIFIER = :modifier>> <<and EOIC.MODIFY_TIME = :modifyTime>> <<and EOIC.REC_VER LIKE :recVer>> <<and EOIC.REC_STATUS LIKE :recStatus>> <<and EOIC.ORG_ID=:orgId>> <<and EOIC.TIME_ZONE LIKE:timeZone>> <<and EOIC.PM_CODE LIKE:pmCode>> <<and EOIC.EOIC_EODP_PM_CODE LIKE :eoicEodpPmCode>> <<and EOIC.EOIC_NO LIKE :eoicNo>> <<and EOIC.EOIC_LEFT_BRACKET LIKE:eoicLeftBracket>> <<and EOIC.EOIC_COLUMN_CODE LIKE:eoicColumnCode>> <<and EOIC.EOIC_OPERATE LIKE:eoicOperate>> <<and EOIC.EOIC_VALUE LIKE :eoicValue>> <<and EOIC.EOIC_RIGHT_BRACKET LIKE :eoicRightBracket>> <<and EOIC.EOIC_CONTROL_LOGIC LIKE :eoicControlLogic>> <<and EOIC.EOIC_EODP_PM_CODE in (:eoicEodpPmCodes)>> ORDER BY EOIC.EOIC_NO ASC /*按序号降序排序*/
